rules_text:
Menace
At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, put a zeal counter on target Faerie.
{1}{B}, Remove a zeal counter from this creature: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
notes:
Type A — BR

Version that is perhaps better design but not great for first-time players of the set:
Empathy — Choose a nonland card name. Target opponent reveals their hand and discards all cards with that name.

Could also be
Empathy — Look at target opponent’s hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player discards that card and draws a card.

QQ
